alert.note: Alert for Adams; Broomfield; Denver; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 3:52PM MDT until June 29 at 4:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Broomfield County in northeastern Colorado... Denver County in northeastern Colorado... Northeastern Jefferson County in central Colorado... Western Adams County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 430 PM MDT. * At 351 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over northwestern Denver, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Federal Heights, Commerce City, Northglenn and Brighton. This includes Denver International Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central and northeastern Colorado. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for central and northeastern Colorado.
